DOC.brief_summary: In orthodontics , conventional fixed appliance , usually consist prefabricated component , require step-by-step adjustment order move teeth plan direction . May treatment improve customized archwires ? Study hypotheses : - By use CAD/CAM plan fabrication customize archwires , unnecessary tooth movement avoid teeth move direct path intend position . - The application CAD/CAM improve reproducibility , efficiency , quality orthodontic treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Study Investigating Tooth Movements With Conventional Computer-Aided Design/Computer-Aided Manufacturing ( CAD/CAM ) Supported Fixed Appliances
